concept.title: Convert to Path
concept.shortdesc: The option is available on the main popup menu and appears enabled when an element is selected.

section.p: This option allows you to convert any element to a path element. The attributes of your original element are retained during the conversion. The element appears exactly as it was before converting to a path, but in the XML it will no longer be an element of its old type, but now a path element. This may be useful for when only a path is required.

The conversion can also be used on path element, you may require this, as the conversion to path, strips out any translates, scales or any other transformations applied to the old path, and returns a path which is exactly the same without these transformations

The menu option becomes available when one or more elements are selected, when multiple elements are selected, this option will not convert all elements to a single path, but instead will convert each selected element to its own respective path
